name: Break It All
description:
Break it all! is a fun first person 3D shooter game.
Pick the most destructive weapon you can find and shatter everything in your path! Make the longest combo you can to move faster towards your next target and create an even more chaotic spectacle!
Feed your appetite for destruction !

Controls:

ZQSD - Move
Left click - Hit/Shoot
Spacebar - Jump
Walk on weapons - Pick'em up

The Team:

  • Thomas Kang , Programmer
  • Esbelin Antoine , Programmer
  • Vincent Parvillier , Game Designer
  • Léopold Walho , Game Artist
